protein.specific_function: Rab effector protein acting as linker between gamma- adaptin, RAB4A or RAB5A. Involved in endocytic membrane fusion and membrane trafficking of recycling endosomes. Stimulates nucleotide exchange on RAB5A. Can act as a ubiquitin ligase

reference.reference_text: Nimmrich I, Erdmann S, Melchers U, Finke U, Hentsch S, Moyer MP, Hoffmann I, Muller O: Seven genes that are differentially transcribed in colorectal tumor cell lines. Cancer Lett. 2000 Nov 10;160(1):37-43.
